name: Step Out (Hai Dang)
description:
A little girl wants to escape this seemingly wonderful world. But it's not only her here, there's another, but that's another being - the dark being.

A short pixel game, playing time about 10-15 minutes. The colors black and gray, as her mood.

Use arrow keys to move, spacebar to interact.

This is the 2nd game I've made. It will be the experience for the next games that I will make. The game was made in 10 days.
